snippet.title: [RPG Maker Horror Game Jam #7 Game: Hunter Becomes Hunted] RACK AND RUN (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
Game link: https://lwlvyei.itch.io/rack-and-run
Commentary Version: https://youtu.be/pWuQhzk1lF0

(A bit of capitalization typo on the game info in video, so I'm sorry in advanced about that. Also this no commentary is unedited like the commentary one, so yeah.)

No timestamp needed, it's a very short game.

RACK AND RUN is a 10-15 min. RPG Maker Horror game, where a new hunter gets her first kill, but of course, the kill becomes the hunter. Played fully in HARD judgement.

Overall, for a 10-15 min game (or even under, if you got good reflexes/just lucky in the timing minigame), it's good enough... but the graphics/cg, especially, the characters/NPCs, make up for it, as it's really stylistic. The minigame, tho seen a number of times I guess, is good I guess.

Well we are not done yet on this game jam, as there's one more game, specifically I mentioned this during one game in commentary version, of playing a game by someone else released on this game jam, so stay tuned!

Anyway, I hope you enjoy!
